parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The token used to start the next query to retrieve more results.

> This parameter is not required in the first query. If not all results are returned in one query, you can specify the **NextToken** value returned for the query to perform the next query.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description:
The IDs of the instances.

> *   You must specify this parameter or the **Tag** parameter.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The resource type. Set the value to **INSTANCE**.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags of the instance. You must specify this parameter or the **ResourceId** parameter.
